extDescription.message: In a YouTube Live chat, the moderator's and owner's statements will be fixed on the screen for a certain period of time.

option_fix_verified.message: Fix verified moderator and channel owner.

option_fix_names.message: Specify user names to be fixed (new line for each name)

option_fix_ignore_names.message: Specify user names to be ignored (new line for each name)

option_ngwords_hidden_message.message: Hide only chat text (show original text on mouseover)
